definition: to seize and take control without authority and possibly with force
details:
verb
- to seize and take control without authority and possibly with force
= example: to seize and take control without authority and possibly with force
= synonyms: assume
- to demand as being one's due or property
= example: to demand as being one's due or property
= synonyms: claim
- to make undue claims to having
= example: to make undue claims to having
